rules.title: Become a Spell Genius!
rules.description: Put your spelling prowess to the test and become a true Spell Genius! Challenge your friends and see who can master the art of vocabulary.
message: 1. Click 'Start Spell Genius' to begin your journey.
2. **Listen to the word**: Hear the pronunciation of the hidden word to get a clue.
3. **Spell the Word**: Type one letter at a time to guess the word. You have 5 chances!
4. **Decipher the Hints**: The letters will light up to show you what's right and wrong:
- Green: The letter is in the correct spot.
- Red: The letter is in the wrong spot.
5. **Check Your Genius**: Once you've filled in the word, click 'Check Spelling' to see if you're a Spell Genius.
6. **Keep Practicing**: If your guess is incorrect, don't worry - you'll get another chance. Stay focused and try again!
7. **Level Up**: If you spell the word correctly, you'll see a 'Genius!' message. Click 'Next Challenge' to take on a new word and prove your mastery.
